channel.title: Project 2006
channel.description:
Project 2006
How it came about? I thought of the good days back when Runescape was fun. I noticed some of these old-school servers never being finished. They would have a great start but would never finish and open for beta testing etc. This server I hope to be different, I hope to put this server at it's full potential. If you're interested in joining this project and have the same interest in old-school Runescape as I do. Feel free to join the project.
What source? I'm using Hyperion.
[size=18pt][COLOR=Orange][B]HOW TO APPLY FOR DEVO TEAM[/B][/COLOR][/size]
First go to the [COLOR=Black][B][URL=http://"http://project2006.org"][size=12pt]Website[/size][/URL][/B][/COLOR]
Then scroll down until you see this:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cLlk4.png[/img]
When you do, click "Join the development team"
Once you click that you will be redirected to a page that looks like this:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oiocq.jpg[/img]
It's our application page, once there scroll down and you will see our application.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A6EEQ.png[/img]
Fill out the required fields, once you've done so scroll to the bottom and you should see "Submit your application"
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Nbybc.png[/img]
Once you submit your application, it will be emailed to us and we'll contact you asap if you meet the requirements.
[size=18pt][b]Development team[/b][/size]
Overall developer - Myself Server coder/web development - John Server developer - C++Coder
[b][size=24pt][font=arial black]Progress[/font][/size][/b]
Green = complete Orange = in progress Red = not started
[size=14pt][font=arial black][b][u]Forums[/u][/b][/font][/size]
Old RS website installed
[size=14pt][u][b]Server development[/b][/u][/size]
[u]Magic[/u]
Magic on player Magic on npc Modern spellbook (Up to bolt + alchemy high/low) Ancient Spellbook(Icespells work)
[u]Melee[/u] Maxhit/weapon timers/Spec attacks (pvp only) Every bow and arrow type, special attacks, arrows drop on ground(pvp only)
[u]Minigames[/u] Fightcaves, all waves.
[u]Quests[/u] Cooks assistant (complete quest)
[u]Skills[/u] Firemaking base Woodcutting base Mining/Prospecting Thieving (stalls) Thieving (pickpocketing) Herb Identifying
[u]Misc[/u] Money colors added Report Abuse system
[size=18pt]Media[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lMnqN.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eid3j.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A16pN.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FAPps.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3ACxS.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G6Ofv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0ecCR.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0UHWN.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7qZFs.png[/img]
